original_text: And the Lord said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil?
korean_text: 여호와께서 사탄에게 이르시되 네가 내 종 욥을 주의하여 보았느냐 그와 같이 온전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자는 세상에 없느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Satan
Hast thou considered my servant Job
that there is none like him in the earth
a perfect and an upright man
